panels.visual: Epic fantasy comic book cover featuring all five heroes standing together against backdrop of Everpeak Citadel during winter solstice. Val (brass dragonborn monk) in foreground, Prismor (crystal dragonborn paladin) standing protectively, Apocalypse Winter (human wizard) with glowing magic, Lunara (high elf druid) with nature magic swirling, Malrik (drow rogue) in shadows. Massive crystalline citadel towers in background with magical lights. Dramatic lighting, heroic composition.

characters.Val: Brass dragonborn monk. Just under 7 feet tall, lean athletic build with wiry monk strength. Warm brass/copper-bronze scales with metallic sheen. Ember-glow orange eyes, bright and expressive. Reptilian face with kind open expression, shorter snout. Simple monastery robes in earth tones (browns, tans) with chalk dust marks. Bare clawed feet. Prayer beads around wrist.
characters.Prismor: Blue crystal dragonborn paladin. 7 feet tall, imposing presence. Muscular powerful warrior's physique. Crystalline blue scales with hints of green, gem-like quality. Deep sapphire blue eyes, wise and contemplative. Noble dignified reptilian features. Plate armor with crystalline accents, Oath of the Ancients symbols (leaves, vines) etched in armor. Greatsword strapped to back. Forest green cape.
characters.Apocalypse Winter: Human wizard, early 20s. 5'10" tall. Strong but scholarly build. Dark hair, somewhat unkempt from library hours. Keen blue eyes, intelligent and curious. Pale skin from indoor studying. Determined jawline. Practical wizard robes in deep blue with silver trim. Leather satchel stuffed with scrolls. Component pouch. Ink-stained fingers. Reading glasses.
characters.Lunara: High elf druid, Circle of the Moon. 5'6" tall. Graceful athletic build. Long flowing auburn hair with flower braids. Vivid emerald green eyes with golden flecks. Fair skin with faint leaf-pattern tattoos. Delicate elven features, pointed ears. Forest green and brown leather armor. Living wood staff with crystal. Pouches with herbs. Bare feet. Moves with fluid grace.
characters.Malrik: Drow rogue. 5'8" tall. Lean wiry acrobat's build. Dark charcoal skin. White-silver hair in half-up style. Striking red-violet eyes. Sharp angular drow features. Dark leather armor, fitted and flexible. Twin daggers, throwing knives, lockpicks. Dark cloak. Moves with precise confident grace.

panels.prompt:
Epic fantasy comic book cover art in professional sequential art style.

Title Treatment: 'EVERPEAK CITADEL: Echoes of the Dawn's Crown' in bold fantasy lettering at top.

Composition: Heroic group shot of five adventurers standing together in dramatic formation.

Characters (front to back):
- Val (center-front): Brass dragonborn monk, just under 7 feet tall, lean athletic build, warm brass/copper-bronze scales with metallic sheen, ember-glow orange eyes, kind reptilian expression, simple earth-tone monastery robes with chalk marks, bare clawed feet, prayer beads on wrist, dynamic stance
- Prismor (left-back): Blue crystal dragonborn paladin, 7 feet tall, imposing muscular build, crystalline blue-green scales (gem-like), sapphire eyes, noble bearing, ornate plate armor with nature symbols, greatsword visible, forest green cape, protective stance
- Apocalypse Winter (right-front): Human wizard, early 20s, 5'10", strong scholarly build, dark unkempt hair, keen blue eyes, pale skin, deep blue robes with silver trim, leather satchel, glowing magical energy around hands, reading glasses, confident expression
- Lunara (right-back): High elf druid, 5'6", graceful athletic build, long flowing auburn hair with flowers, emerald green eyes with gold flecks, fair skin, leaf tattoos, forest green and brown leather armor, living wood staff with crystal, nature magic swirling around her, bare feet
- Malrik (far left): Drow rogue, 5'8", lean wiry build, dark charcoal skin, white-silver hair, striking red-violet eyes, sharp features, dark fitted leather armor, twin daggers visible, dark cloak, emerging from shadows, roguish grin

Background: Massive Everpeak Citadel - towering fortress carved from white stone with crystalline spires reaching toward sky, magical lights glowing from windows, snow-capped mountain peaks, winter solstice setting with celestial alignment visible in sky, dramatic storm clouds, magical energy crackling through air.

Lighting: Dramatic heroic lighting from above, rim lighting on characters, magical glows from wizard and druid, crystalline reflections from Prismor's scales, golden hour warm tones mixed with cool magical blues.

Style: Professional comic book cover art, bold ink line art, vibrant colors, dynamic composition, graphic novel quality, heroic fantasy genre, detailed character work, epic scale.

Mood: Epic adventure, heroic determination, magical mystery, team unity.

No speech bubbles or dialogue boxes.
